includedAssets.title: Day 5: 7:00 A.M. To 8:00 A.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S5, Ep1 - Day 5: 7:00 A.M. To 8:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: 7:00am to 8:00am: He may be on the run, but Jack Bauer can't escape danger. Day five starts ticking, and a terrifying chain of events forces Jack back to LA...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: He may be on the run, but Jack Bauer can't escape danger. Day five starts ticking, and a terrifying chain of events forces Jack back to LA...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: 7:00am to 8:00am: He may be on the run, but Jack Bauer can't escape danger. Day five starts ticking, and a terrifying chain of events forces Jack back to LA...

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 8:00 A.M. To 9:00 A.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S5, Ep2 - Day 5: 8:00 A.M. To 9:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack thought he'd covered his tracks, but CTU's on to him. While Chloe risks it all helping him, the kidnappers prepare to blackmail the president.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack thought he'd covered his tracks, but CTU's on to him. While Chloe risks it all helping him, the kidnappers prepare to blackmail the president.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack thought he'd covered his tracks, but CTU's on to him. While Chloe risks it all helping him, the kidnappers prepare to blackmail the president.

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 9:00 A.M. To 10:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: CTU prepares to storm the airport, but they're running out of time. Diane's kidnapped son Derek is next in line to be killed...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: CTU prepares to storm the airport, but they're running out of time. Diane's kidnapped son Derek is next in line to be killed...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: CTU prepares to storm the airport, but they're running out of time. Diane's kidnapped son Derek is next in line to be killed...

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 10:00 A.M. To 11:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: The 100th episode of the ground-breaking series. New recruit Lynn McGill (Sean Astin) joins CTU, and immediately rocks the boat...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The 100th episode of the ground-breaking series. New recruit Lynn McGill (Sean Astin) joins CTU, and immediately rocks the boat...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The 100th episode of the ground-breaking series. New recruit Lynn McGill (Sean Astin) joins CTU, and immediately rocks the boat...

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 11:00 A.M. To 12:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: CTU makes a horrifying discovery: the terrorists are in possession of a nerve gas. But worse still, an assassin has Jack in his sights...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: CTU makes a horrifying discovery: the terrorists are in possession of a nerve gas. But worse still, an assassin has Jack in his sights...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: CTU makes a horrifying discovery: the terrorists are in possession of a nerve gas. But worse still, an assassin has Jack in his sights...

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 12:00 P.M. To 1:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Presidential aide Cummings is under fire and it looks as if he's struck a deal with the terrorists.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Presidential aide Cummings is under fire and it looks as if he's struck a deal with the terrorists.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Presidential aide Cummings is under fire and it looks as if he's struck a deal with the terrorists.

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 1:00 P.M. To 2:00 P.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S5, Ep7 - Day 5: 1:00 P.M. To 2:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Meet public enemy number one: Jacob Rossler. He'll tell where the nerve gas is, in exchange for a 15 year old girl. Will CTU co-operate? Can they afford not to?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Meet public enemy number one: Jacob Rossler. He'll tell where the nerve gas is, in exchange for a 15 year old girl. Will CTU co-operate?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Meet public enemy number one: Jacob Rossler. He'll tell where the nerve gas is, in exchange for a 15 year old girl. Will CTU co-operate? Can they afford not to?

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 2:00 P.M. To 3:00 P.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S5, Ep8 - Day 5: 2:00 P.M. To 3:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: With Jack undercover, CTU presents President Logan with a lethal dilemma: kill the terrorists and lose critical intel, or stand by and watch as hundreds die...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With Jack undercover, CTU presents President Logan with a lethal dilemma.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With Jack undercover, CTU presents President Logan with a lethal dilemma: kill the terrorists and lose critical intel, or stand by and watch as hundreds die...

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 3:00 P.M. To 4:00 P.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S5, Ep9 - Day 5: 3:00 P.M. To 4:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Enter CTU's latest arch enemy: Vladimir Bierko (Julian Sands). He wants to assassinate Russian President Suvarov, with President Logan's help.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Enter CTU's latest arch enemy: Vladimir Bierko (Julian Sands). He wants to assassinate Russian President Suvarov, with President Logan's help.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Enter CTU's latest arch enemy: Vladimir Bierko (Julian Sands). He wants to assassinate Russian President Suvarov, with President Logan's help.

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 4:00 P.M. To 5:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Is this Day Five's hottest hour yet? 24 reaches a crescendo of suspense as the terrorists, out to kill the Russian premier, literally go ballistic.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Is this Day Five's hottest hour yet? 24 reaches a crescendo of suspense as the terrorists, out to kill the Russian premier, literally go ballistic.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Is this Day Five's hottest hour yet? 24 reaches a crescendo of suspense as the terrorists, out to kill the Russian premier, literally go ballistic.

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 5:00 P.M. To 6:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: The terrorists' next nerve-gas target: a hospital. Time of attack: 6 o'clock. As the seconds count down, Lynn's sister realises she's in too deep.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The terrorists' next nerve-gas target: a hospital. Time of attack: 6 o'clock. As the seconds count down, Lynn's sister realises she's in too deep.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The terrorists' next nerve-gas target: a hospital. Time of attack: 6 o'clock. As the seconds count down, Lynn's sister realises she's in too deep.

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 6:00 P.M. To 7:00 P.M
includedAssets.altTitle: S5, Ep12 - Day 5: 6:00 P.M. To 7:00 P.M
includedAssets.synopsis: The nerve-gas threat reaches a desperate state of emergency when Bierko's agent infiltrates CTU. Somebody won't make it out alive...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The nerve-gas threat reaches a desperate state of emergency when Bierko's agent infiltrates CTU. Somebody won't make it out alive...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The nerve-gas threat reaches a desperate state of emergency when Bierko's agent infiltrates CTU. Somebody won't make it out alive...

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 7:00 P.M. To 8:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack and Lynn discover that the nerve gas is breaking through the seals that are keeping the CTU survivors alive. But will they manage to stop it in time?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack and Lynn discover that the nerve gas is breaking through the seals that are keeping the CTU survivors alive.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack and Lynn discover that the nerve gas is breaking through the seals that are keeping the CTU survivors alive. But will they manage to stop it in time?

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 8:00 P.M. To 9:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: As the search for Bierko and the nerve gas intensifies, a CTU insider is revealed to have helped the terrorists... But who could the traitor be?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the search for Bierko and the nerve gas intensifies, a CTU insider is revealed to have helped the terrorists... But who could the traitor be?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the search for Bierko and the nerve gas intensifies, a CTU insider is revealed to have helped the terrorists... But who could the traitor be?

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 9:00 P.M. To 10:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack refuses to believe that Audrey helped the terrorists, but is his heart ruling his head...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack refuses to believe that Audrey helped the terrorists, but is his heart ruling his head...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack refuses to believe that Audrey helped the terrorists, but is his heart ruling his head...

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 10:00 P.M. To 11:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: The young daughter of Martha Logan's assistant is kidnapped. And Jack realises that the terrorists' chain of command goes higher than Henderson...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The young daughter of Martha Logan's assistant is kidnapped. And Jack realises that the terrorists' chain of command goes higher than Henderson...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The young daughter of Martha Logan's assistant is kidnapped. And Jack realises that the terrorists' chain of command goes higher than Henderson...

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 11:00 P.M. To 12:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack and Wayne kidnap a bank manager. Karen has Audrey followed when she goes to help her lover, and Henderson searches for Jack. But who will get to him first?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack and Wayne kidnap a bank manager. Karen has Audrey followed when she goes to help her lover, and Henderson searches for Jack.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack and Wayne kidnap a bank manager. Karen has Audrey followed when she goes to help her lover, and Henderson searches for Jack. But who will get to him first?

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 12:00 A.M. To 1:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack delivers the incriminating tape to Secretary Heller, who shockingly turns on him and endangers Audrey. Jack must choose between her and the tape...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack delivers the incriminating tape to Secretary Heller, who shockingly turns on him and endangers Audrey. Jack must choose between her and the tape.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack delivers the incriminating tape to Secretary Heller, who shockingly turns on him and endangers Audrey. Jack must choose between her and the tape...

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 1:00 A.M. To 2:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack mounts a bid to get the tape back, and it seems that Secretary Heller has no choice but to make the ultimate sacrifice...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack mounts a bid to get the tape back, and it seems that Secretary Heller has no choice but to make the ultimate sacrifice...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack mounts a bid to get the tape back, and it seems that Secretary Heller has no choice but to make the ultimate sacrifice...

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 2:00 A.M. To 3:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Logan gives his most desperate order to date...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Logan gives his most desperate order to date...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Logan gives his most desperate order to date...

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 3:00 A.M. To 4:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Graham gives Logan more instructions, but things are becoming trickier for the President...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Graham gives Logan more instructions, but things are becoming trickier for the President...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Graham gives Logan more instructions, but things are becoming trickier for the President...

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 4:00 A.M. To 5:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: With only three hours remaining, the escape of a prisoner from CTU has serious consequences...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With only three hours remaining, the escape of a prisoner from CTU has serious consequences...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With only three hours remaining, the escape of a prisoner from CTU has serious consequences...

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 5:00 A.M. To 6:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Can Jack stop Bierko as he prepares to launch the missiles? Will Logan's corruption be made public? The final minutes approach...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Can Jack stop Bierko as he prepares to launch the missiles? Will Logan's corruption be made public? The final minutes approach...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Can Jack stop Bierko as he prepares to launch the missiles? Will Logan's corruption be made public? The final minutes approach...

includedAssets.title: Day 5: 6:00 A.M. To 7:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: As the minutes tick by, Day 5 reaches its explosive climax. How will it all end for Jack Bauer, President Logan and the CTU team? Unmissable action. Last in series.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the minutes tick by, Day 5 reaches its explosive climax. How will it all end for Jack Bauer, President Logan and the CTU team? Unmissable action.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the minutes tick by, Day 5 reaches its explosive climax. How will it all end for Jack Bauer, President Logan and the CTU team? Unmissable action. Last in series.

includedAssets.title: Season 5
includedAssets.synopsis: Things get personal for Jack in season five, as he is forced out of hiding to prevent a plot by Russian Separatists and uncover a wider conspiracy. Kiefer Sutherland is back for another pulsating day as the ruthless Jack Bauer.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Things get personal for Jack as he comes out of hiding to foil a plot by Russian Separatists. Kiefer Sutherland is back for a fifth pulsating day.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Things get personal for Jack in season five, as he is forced out of hiding to prevent a plot by Russian Separatists and uncover a wider conspiracy. Kiefer Sutherland is back for another pulsating day as the ruthless Jack Bauer.

includedIn.synopsis: Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.
